transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji Saroj ji, Sarojni bol rahi hu. IndiaMART se relationship manager, aap se baat hui thi na kuch din pehle.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan, aapke concern ke liye. To maine team se baat ki thi directly jo ye buyer supplier conflict handle karti hai, jo ye issues dekhti hai. To unhone bola tha ki aapki agar usme koi bhi buyer se related ya to WhatsApp pe koi chat aapke mention ho jisme by name is tarah se agar abusive language ya kuch mention kara hai ya fir aapko call pe bola hai recorded aapke paas agar ho to wo bhej dijiye taaki hum usko uske according us pe action leke call leke aur buyer ko block kar diya jaaye. Kyunki yaha pe unke paas bhi kuch na kuch norms hote hain, TNCs hote hain jis vajah se unko uske according hi action lena hota hai. Ye aapke aur buyer ke beech discussion hua hai yaha pe aisa kuch bhi hamare paas recorded mein nahi hai.
Executive: To hum buyer ko bolenge to buyer palat bhi sakta hai ki ye bol rahi hu ki aapke paas agar aisa kahin pe bhi ho WhatsApp written mein bhi ho to bhi aap bhej do to hum usko raise kar denge. Maine saari cheeze usme dekh li thi to buyer ko call karegi team directly fir iske according aur fir block kar denge.
Executive: To aap bataiye hai kuch aapke paas WhatsApp WhatsApp ka bhi kuch?
Customer: Madam.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: I am a businessman, samajhiye. Okay. I have been working with IndiaMART from last seven years.
Executive: Haan, ye to aapke portal pe dikh hi raha hai sab.
Customer: Dikh hi raha hai. Ye meri first aisi complaint hai jisme ek aadmi mujhe gaali de raha hai aur main IndiaMART ke paas aa raha hu ki saab saat saal baad mere ko ek aisa person mila hai jo mujhe abusive language de raha hai wo galat kaam kar raha hai. Theek hai. Ab IndiaMART mujhe ye keh rahi hai ki aap uske liye evidence collect karo. Theek hai madam.
Executive: Sir collect nahi karo aap agar complaint to lo meri baat sun lo aap theek hai.
Executive: Ya to meri credibility nahi hai ki main jhoota aadmi hu. Ek cheez to ye hai. Dusra ye hai ki IndiaMART ko un customer ki itni achchi wo hai uski reputation ki aap kar rahe ho as well. Theek hai. Hmm. Fir bhi IndiaMART chahti hai ki uske against koi question ki question nahi kar sakte saab hum usse. Theek hai. Ek cheez ye do cheez to ye moral background thi. Teesri cheez as I am paying IndiaMART for few things. Hmm hmm. Which also clears that part if something unethical happens with me with my company IndiaMART will be there for this thing. Theek hai. Opposite mein agar main bhi galat karunga IndiaMART ke customer ke sath mein to aisa aapke paas bhi hai ki you will take a disciplinary action. Sahi baat hai aap evidence ki. To next time I will be very careful ki main pehle evidence collect karu. Theek hai agar main evidence collect hi kar leta mam theek hai to main next option IndiaMART ke paas nahi hounga kabhi then I will go for a police station cyber crime ke andar. But I am a businessman I am not a lawyer or main iske liye nahi bana hu. Main apni problems resolve karne ke liye IndiaMART ke paas aata hu apne time waste karne ke liye thodi na aaya ki mere ko ye sab karna padega aur business nahi karu. Who will take care of my buyleads and everything ye bataiye. Who will take care of my business if I do such thing. For that only na hum sabhi to third party organize karte hain ki wo hamara kaam kare. Hamare agencies handle kare. To ye cheeze aap team ko convey karo. They can either do it or not do it.
Executive: Sir iske is pe aapne apne pointers rakh diye hain main aapko us cheez pe hi batati hu. First of all to aapke yaha pe maine account mein dekha aapke bhi kaafi saare buyer supplier conflict aapke against mein bhi khule the jo ki previously aapne kuch resolve bhi karaye hain aur kuch mein complaint agar yaha pe buyer ne dala hai jisme koi bhi buyer ki taraf se hume document receive nahi hua hai to humne buyer ke bhi wo jo complaint hai unko directly stop kar diya hai. Aapke account mein wo cheez waha pe mention bhi nahi hai. Main aapko kya keh raha hu. Main wahi keh raha hu buyer sab conflict kar raha hai.
Executive: To sir aapne maine maine aapki puri baat suni aap main bhi aapko kuch samjhana chah rahi hu usme. Aapke against document. Meri baat samjhiye.
Customer: Main sir convince nahi kar rahi isme same story hai isliye main aapko convince karunga. Aap Rishabh se pucho what I do and what I work. Usse pucho wo aapko sab bata dega. Ki main jab baat karta hu na to main bahut soch samajh ke baat karta hu. Main kisi ko convince karne ke liye baat nahi karta hu. Main sirf ek cheez chahta hu ki IndiaMART ye kar sakti hai ya nahi kar sakti mera abhi bhi ek hi answer hoga. Either you can do it or not. It is not possible then I am not worried about at all. Theek hai. To ye mera kaam hai business.
Executive: Main aapko wahi batana chah rahi hu us point mein ki aap jo evidence ki baat kar rahe ho evidence hum buyer ki complaint bhi hoti hai to bhi hum evidence wo waha pe lete hain saari cheeze proof karte hain tabhi hum aage karte hain. Legal transaction hota hai businessman kabhi kisi ko gaali nahi deta hai. Aapko wo saat saal se jo company aapke sath kaam kar rahi hai reputed company theek hai wo aisa kaam kyun karegi jo saat saal mein pehli baar aisa grievance leke aayi hai aur usme unko ye bolne ki jagah ki haan theek hai we will take care of it.
Executive: Sir mujhe mujhe aap ye bataoge kis according hum us pe waha pe unke upar. Madam kisi according nahi aap khali ek baat bologe ki aapne subah jab ye call kiya tab wo unki jo company hai wo agar call nahi utha paayi fir aapne unko ye bola ki mere negative review isliye. Wo buyer ko bataenge. Sir wo to main apne level pe bhi buyer ko bata dungi but aapka company hai.
Customer: Aap bhi sort out nahi karo to theek hai usse bhi koi load nahi hai uske liye bhi mere paas ek tarika aur hai. Itna bada bhagwan nahi ho gaya wo buyer mere liye. Theek hai main ye keh raha hu ki aisa inko koi mere ko blackmail kar raha hai aap samjho main kya kehna chah raha hu. Mujhe uske ek negative review se koi lena dena nahi hai. I am that intelligent as well. I am thinking of that this person is blackmailing me. I will put a 20 fake accounts ki uske bana ke ya kisi ke dosto ke phone se register karke fir dalunga main to us cheez ke liye khada hu main aapko kya lag raha hai main is aadmi ke liye worried hu. Ek percent worried nahi hu aur main aise blackmailers se worried hu.
Executive: Sir main aapko aapko mera concern dalna yahi tha ki aage jaake agar aisi situation khadi hogi. Main dala hai tabhi to maine aapko sir reply diya na main aapko usi pointer pe hi aage cheeze bata rahi hu but aap sirf agar apne hi point rakh kar ke sirf aage wo cheeze sunenge hi nahi to fir main aage wo kuch bhi aapko.
Customer: Main to samajh gaya aap ye keh rahe ho dekho mere ko ek baat batao. Sir maine to aapko puri cheeze boli nahi aapne beech mein meri baat kaati main aapko kuch bol rahi hu to aap keh rahe ho ki pehle meri baat suniye. Main bhi to apni cheeze kuch aapko batana chah rahi hu jo hamare process mein hai. Uske according hi to hum kar paenge cheeze. Drop an email on that part I will reply on the email later. Aap email se hi main us pe drop kya karu email sir maine to already us recording pe baat ki hai. Aap email pe hi karo minutes minutes hote hain har company mein ye jawab hota hai theek hai. Nahi aapko mail pe agar mention hai main aapko mail pe wo cheeze likh kar ke de dungi bilkul hamare yaha pe. Reply kar dunga aap kyun jagad rahe hain. Hamare yaha pe aapki taraf se kuch document chahiye hoga for that particular issues jo bhi aapko hai then I will then we will raise that concern with that particular team. Hum waha pe ye cheeze mention kar denge but aap ye bolo ki aapke bina document ke hum ye cheeze aage process kar de to wo to hum buyer ki bhi nahi cheeze lete hain. To aapko ye cheez samajhni padegi aapke according bhi kahin aap complaint FIR bhi karte jaake waha pe bhi aap se evidence manga hi jata hai. Bina evidence ke kuch bhi reason nahi ho jati hai. To ye to on process kahin pe bhi aap jaoge to. IndiaMART thodi na pakad raha hota police station mein bitha raha hota. Sir is process samjhane ki main baat kar rahi hu aapko. Aapko blackmail karna hai main wo samajh rahi hu lekin aapke paas wo recording hai aapke paas barabar bol raha hai wo agar buyer aisa to aap bhej dijiye main wahi to keh rahi hu. Ab sorry call ki to koi recording karta nahi hoga na aapko nahi pata. Are sir aapko ye pata hai na ki buyer se abhi mere paas is tarah ki call aayegi to aap jisse dusra jo call pe baat kar rahe ho aap bagal mein koi dusra phone usse record kar lijiye. I will take care of that part as well ab wo bhi kar lenge ab to theek hai par mujhe kya pata tha ki theek hai. I don't have voice right now. Aap jo aisi baatein kar rahe ho aap jo aisi baat kar rahe ho ki mujhe kya pata tha ki yaha pe resolution hi nahi hoga aap to aise bol rahe ho but aap samjho aap bhi koi agar company chala rahe hoge to aapke liye to dono part equal hai na aapka bhi buyer bhi aur aapka agar jaha pe aap apna product le rahe honge ya purchase kar rahe honge agar aisa complaint waha se milega to aap to dono cheeze sunenge na. Bina us cheez ke kaise aap action le loge main aapko wahi barabar samjhana chahta hu. Aapne abhi tak us aadmi se baat kari hai. Kisse? Aapki team ne abhi tak us aadmi se baat kari hai. Haan maine baat ki hai tabhi to maine aapko call laga ke dobara se maine pehle Rishabh maine Rishabh ko bola hai tab aapko unhone mujhe unhone ye bola mujhe mujhe unhone ye bola ki aapka waha pe ya to recorded unki call honi chahiye buyer se related ya to unke paas waha pe WhatsApp pe buyer ne aisa kuch bola ho tab wo cheeze aap bhej kar do uske according waha pe action liya jayega. Main ye puch raha hu aapne jis aadmi ke liye complaint ki na jis aadmi ke against usse kisi ne abhi tak baat kari hai ki nahi kari. Aadmi ke against complaint aapne kari hai na ye bol rahe ho aap. Ya fir team ne abhi tak usse kisi ne baat kari hai ki nahi kari aapki team se. Nahi usse baat sir kaise hogi wo team jo buyer wali team hai jo ye dekhti hai. Aap yaha pe this is the thing. Sir aap cha rahe ho ki bina bina bina wo to main baat karungi aap batao to main call karungi unko aapko main recording bhej dungi. Jis din us aadmi ka attitude sun loge na aap theek hai jis din us aadmi ka attitude sun loge na tarike se baat karta hai wo Bihar ka aadmi hai. Ab mujhe itna batao. Main main agree karti hu waha ke area ke bahut saare log hain us tarah ke main wo us cheez pe deny nahi hu main ye bhi nahi keh rahi hu ki aap jhoot bol rahe ho. Bas isko aap drop kar do main aapko sununga. Madam madam are proof mila dunga wo bhi tension nahi hai koi bada kaam nahi hai. Aap mere ko mail drop kar do main mere concern authority ko bhej dunga aur wo aage kaam karti rahegi team. Theek hai. Haan to ye abhi ke liye jo aapne yaha pe dala hai ki iske according aap kuch jo aapne mail dala hai us pe kya karna hai mujhe kyunki maine already teen cheeze team ko raise kar di team ne evidence manga hai aapne evidence diya nahi. Haan to aap bas ye likho we need an evidence please provide us a recording or WhatsApp conversation if something happens we will take care action with that ye likh ke bhejo fir main usme team ko bolta hu they will take care of this thing theek hai kyunki process yahi hota hai. Theek hai na mere ko aapko yahi tarika hota hai kaam karne ka. Nahi koi nahi aapko aapko mail chahiye main to aapko mail pe bhej hi dungi do cheeze maine discuss kari hai team se main aapko verbally wahi cheeze bata rahi hu wahi cheeze aapko mail pe bhej dungi mujhe koi dikkat nahi hai. Kyunki mujhe bhi mere aage wale authority ko dena padta hai aur main return mein nahi bolta hu. Theek hai main rest ye aapka concern jo hai yaha pe usko close karu kyunki team ki taraf se as such usme koi action tabhi liya jayega jab aapki taraf se kuch update proof ke regarding. Close thodi na hoga madam ab to chalu hoga ye conversation ab aayegi recording. Nahi ye aapne jo jo aapne sir aap sunenge aapne jo ye raise kara hai wo yaha pe hamare yaha pe service part se related raise hai na ki us particular buyer se related aapka ye concern raise hua hai. Main aapko ye cheez kya keh rahe hain aap? Mail se to dala hai na maine. Mail se to dala hai but yaha pe aapke account mein ye dikha raha hai service se related aapko chahiye to main aapko WhatsApp pe screenshot bhej deti hu jo aapke account mein dikh raha hai. Haan to agar ye aisa hai service se related to usko close karna hai ya open rakhna hai mujhe aap batao. Wo to madam main mere authority se puchunga main aage wale se close karu main bhi to puch ke agar wo nahi bataenge. Sir wo aise to kyun nahi sab hierarchy mein hai na sab jaise Rishabh aapke under hai. Nahi nahi nahi aap owner hai matlab ya fir koi manager yaha pe aap hain ya handle karte hain aisa kuch. Normal manager hu madam. Achcha achcha achcha theek hai theek hai koi nahi main fir aapko bhej deti hu mujhe laga ki shayad aap main decision maker owner hi hain isliye. Hmm. Theek hai koi nahi main.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received abusive language from a buyer.

- Wants IndiaMART to take action against the buyer.

- Concerned about IndiaMART asking for evidence.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the process for taking action.

- Executive clarified the need for evidence.

- Executive offered to raise the concern with the team.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send evidence via email.



Alert (If Any):

blackmail

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- abusive language, evidence, buyer, complaint, resolution
